ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is the Day they will not say a single word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will not be able to speak that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That will be the Day on which they will not (be able to) utter a word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day they will not be able to speak,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is a day in which they will not be able to speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That will be a Day when they shall not speak (during some part of it),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the day on which they shall not speak,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is the day they shall not speak
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is a day wherein they speak not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day they will be speechless,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is a Day whereon they shall not be able to speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is a day wherein they will not speak,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That will be a Day when they shall not be able to speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That will be a Day when they shall not speak (during some part of it),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is the Day they shall not speak,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is a Day when they will not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is a Day they will not speak,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:35] This, namely, the Day of Resurrection, is the day in which they will not utter, anything,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is a day wherein they speak not) in some places and speak in others,
